activities: Forensiq, LLC provides fraud detection services for companies conducting business online and in the course of providing these services may collect IP addresses which may be transferred from the EU to the US for analysis. Forensiq, LLC may also receive limited information about employees in their UK office such as employment contracts.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: IP addresses from users and employee contracts from employees in UK. This would include anything manually processed.
